word: H8199 - שָׁפַט - shâphaṭ - shaw-fat' - Avenge - பழிவாங்கு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - தீர், நியாயம் விசாரி, தீர்ப்பு செய், நியாயந்தீர், நியாயம் பேசு, நீதிசெய், வழக்காடு, நியாயாதிபதி, தீர்க்கதரிசி, மணியக்காரர், வழக்கு, ஆக்கினை
to judge, to govern, to vindicate, to punish
1) to act as law - giver or judge or governor (used of God or man), to rule, to govern, to judge
2) to decide controversy (used of God or man)
d) at the theophanic advent for final judgment
1) to enter into controversy, to plead, to have controversy together
c) (Poel) a judge, a opponent - at - law (participle)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to judge, that is, pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication to vindicate or punish; by extension to govern; passively to litigate (literally or figuratively): - + avenge, X that condemn, contend, defend, execute (judgment), (be a) judge (-ment), X needs, plead, reason, rule.
Cognate: H4941, H8196, H8199, H8201, H8202, H8203, H8204
